dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, uh, are we seriously going to pretend another tiny tremor in Kazakhstan is news?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, uh, are we seriously going to pretend another tiny tremor in Kazakhstan is news?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, the Ministry of Emergency Situations did report an actual earthquake. It was recorded.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, the Ministry of Emergency Situations did report an actual earthquake. It was recorded.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstani seismologists recorded an earthquake with its epicenter located within the country, 323 kilometers southwest of Almaty, during the night, according to the press service of the Ministry of Emergency Situations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Recorded." By who, exactly? Some seismologists way out in the middle of nowhere?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Recorded. By who, exactly? Some seismologists way out in the middle of nowhere?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstani seismologists, actually. Their network of seismic stations picked it up, um, March 28th at 3:42 AM.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstani seismologists, actually. Their network of seismic stations picked it up, um, March twenty eighth at three forty two a m.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstani seismologists recorded an earthquake... The seismic tremor was detected by the network of seismic stations on March 28 at 3:42 AM Astana time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Picked it up." So, like, a slight rumble? Was it even felt by, you know, actual people?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Picked it up. So, like, a slight rumble? Was it even felt by, you know, actual people?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They estimate the intensity, on the MSK scale, was five points in Merke village.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They estimate the intensity, on the M S K scale, was five points in Merke village.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reported intensity: The estimated intensity (on the MSK scale) was: Merke village " 5 points

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Five points. What does that even mean? Is that, like, a strong gust of wind?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five points. What does that even mean? Is that, like, a strong gust of wind?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, uh, five points isn't nothing. Kulan village was four points.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, uh, five points isn't nothing. Kulan village was four points.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reported intensity: The estimated intensity (on the MSK scale) was: Merke village " 5 points, Kulan village " 4 points

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And any, you know, actual damage? Or casualties? Or did a teacup just rattle?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And any, you know, actual damage? Or casualties? Or did a teacup just rattle?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The report, um, specifically says no casualties or damage have been received.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The report, um, specifically says no casualties or damage have been received.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No reports of casualties or damage have been received.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Because it was probably just, what, a truck driving by? 323 kilometers from Almaty? That's quite a stretch for a "real" earthquake with no impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Because it was probably just, what, a truck driving by? three hundred twenty three kilometers from Almaty? That's quite a stretch for a real earthquake with no impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstani seismologists recorded an earthquake with its epicenter located within the country, 323 kilometers southwest of Almaty, during the night

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It was located within the country, though. And, like, 3:42 AM Astana time. That's pretty precise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was located within the country, though. And, like, three forty two a m Astana time. That's pretty precise.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstani seismologists recorded an earthquake with its epicenter located within the country... The seismic tremor was detected by the network of seismic stations on March 28 at 3:42 AM Astana time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Precise time for a non-event, you mean. So, effectively, nothing happened. Again.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precise time for a non-event, you mean. So, effectively, nothing happened. Again.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, it was detected. The city of Shu, Taraz, they all registered two points.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, it was detected. The city of Shu, Taraz, they all registered two points.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the city of Shu, the city of Taraz, the villages of Tole Bi, Sarykemer, Kordai, Asa, and Moyinkum " 2 points.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Two points. Sounds like, uh, I coughed too hard. Honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two points. Sounds like, uh, I coughed too hard. Honestly.
